short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transfer your Book Connect data directly to KDP with this simple to use BCI KDP Integrator.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The BCI Kdp Integrator allows users of Book Connect to integrate the data in their Book One system to KDP easily.
